Title: How open source is designing the sustainable cities of the future
Author: GitHub
Description:
Cities produce 70% of global carbon emissions, but open source can be part of the solution. Meet City Energy Analyst, a project on GitHub for designing smarter, cleaner, and more sustainable cities. Learn how the team uses GitHub Copilot to speed up their work and how you can contribute.

#OpenSource #ClimateChange #GitHub
